p: The alkaloids isolated from roots of W. somnifera plant exhibited prolonged hypotensive, respiratory stimulant, and bradycardiac actions in dogs ( 237). The cardioprotective effect of hydro-alcoholic extract of W. somnifera at doses of 25, 50, and 100 mg/kg was investigated in isoprenaline (isoproterenol) induced myocardial necrosisÂ using rats as model animals. A significant cardioprotective effect with continuous restoration of the hemodynamic parameter was observed. Various extracts of the plant had been used to increase the beating ratio of the heart by lowering the lipid peroxidation level ( 238, 239).
